item.title: Study: Social media probably can’t be fixed
item.description: “The [structural] mechanism producing these problematic outcomes is really robust and hard to resolve.”

item.title: AI industry horrified to face largest copyright class action ever certified
item.description: Copyright class actions could financially ruin AI industry, trade groups say.

item.title: Mistral’s new “environmental audit” shows how much AI is hurting the planet
item.description: Individual prompts don’t cost much, but billions together can have aggregate impact.
